data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kiew, Ruth, Sam, Yen-Yen (2012): Codonoboea personatiflora (Gesneriaceae), a new species from Peninsular Malaysia. PhytoKeys 18: 61-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.18.3487, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.18.3487
